comment: Professor Morris is definitely passionate , he laughs often while he is lecturing. Exams were easy, they were essay questions and you got the question at least two weeks before it was due, open book and notes. At first I felt that I wasn't learning  bc his lectures are scattered but it did make me more aware of  global and national politics.

This guy is a trip. He is scatter-brained and unorganized but is a nice man. He wastes a lot of class time with BS. IT'S HARD TO MAKE AN A! I work hard and still got a B on most assignments. Tests are essay format and we are allowed to bring an outline and use the book. I found him funny- some students thought he was annoying.
